bibl.title: New Fragments of Alexandrian Wall Painting.
bibl.note: Private Collection Dr. Lillian Malcove. Thirty fragments mounted in four panels, Alexandria (?), late IIIrd or early IVth c. A.D. Resemblances to famous late antique manuscripts with illustrated epic narrations.

bibl.title: Alessandria e il Mondo ellenistico-romano. Studi in onore di Achille Adriani. II

bibl.seg: Hanfmann George M.A., New Fragments of Alexandrian Wall Painting.
Alessandria e il Mondo ellenistico-romano. Studi in onore di Achille Adriani. II (Roma, 1984) pp. 242-255, 1 fig. et pll. XLIV-XLVI.

Private Collection Dr. Lillian Malcove. Thirty fragments mounted in four panels, Alexandria (?), late IIIrd or early IVth c. A.D. Resemblances to famous late antique manuscripts with illustrated epic narrations.
